### bootloader record 
```bash
espsecure.py generate_signing_key --scheme ecdsa256 --version 2 bootloader_signing_key.pem
espsecure.py v4.8.dev4
ECDSA NIST256p private key in PEM format written to bootloader_signing_key.pem

md5sum bootloader_signing_key.pem
8cf90a26332cf343f3b50e3297a8a827  bootloader_signing_key.pem
```

### app record
```bash
imgtool keygen -k app_signing_key.pem -t ecdsa-p256

md5sum app_signing_key.pem
45758c856bffb4aa2a322dfb0acad6e4  app_signing_key.pem

public key:
imgtool getpub -k app_signing_key.pem  -e lang-c
/* Autogenerated by imgtool.py, do not edit. */
const unsigned char ecdsa_pub_key[] = {
    0x30, 0x59, 0x30, 0x13, 0x06, 0x07, 0x2a, 0x86,
    0x48, 0xce, 0x3d, 0x02, 0x01, 0x06, 0x08, 0x2a,
    0x86, 0x48, 0xce, 0x3d, 0x03, 0x01, 0x07, 0x03,
    0x42, 0x00, 0x04, 0x7e, 0x1b, 0xd0, 0x21, 0x16,
    0x4e, 0xd7, 0x22, 0x57, 0x88, 0xe3, 0xe2, 0x7b,
    0x2d, 0xd8, 0x46, 0x00, 0x86, 0xa2, 0x18, 0x6e,
    0x56, 0xfe, 0xc7, 0xd8, 0xdf, 0x8b, 0x7e, 0xfb,
    0x9d, 0x7a, 0xd0, 0xd3, 0x72, 0xca, 0xda, 0x22,
    0x97, 0xb3, 0x59, 0x36, 0x38, 0x18, 0x9e, 0x4b,
    0xc1, 0x01, 0xd9, 0x9f, 0x47, 0x87, 0x63, 0x17,
    0x1c, 0x2c, 0x57, 0xde, 0xf8, 0x47, 0x50, 0x40,
    0x60, 0x32, 0x9c,
};
const unsigned int ecdsa_pub_key_len = 91;
```
